name: Topple
description: If you hit a creature with a weapon that has the Topple property, you can force the creature to make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + your ability modifier used for the attack roll + your Proficiency Bonus). On a failed save, the creature has the Prone condition.
mechanicalEffect: On hit, force target to make Constitution save (DC 8 + attack ability mod + proficiency bonus) or be knocked Prone.
